plot outline: A girl is the replica of a goddess, but in reality sometimes the truth is fearful. Even today a newborn girl child is killed in the milk barrel filled till the brim or is crushed beneath the legs. This is the story of Hari and Jani, when their Mother dies while giving birth to Jani the society blames her for this and they say she is a curse and the reason for this to happen. Its a story of the struggles and hardships they face in their day to day life. The film also has bollywood celebs like Suniel Shetty and Tamannaah Bhatia playing important roles as well.
title: AA BB KK
plot: A girl is the replica of a goddess, but in reality sometimes the truth is fearful. Even today a newborn girl child is killed in the milk barrel filled till the brim or is crushed beneath the legs. This is the story of Hari and Jani, when their Mother dies while giving birth to Jani the society blames her for this and they say she is a curse and the reason for this to happen. Its a story of the struggles and hardships they face in their day to day life. The film also has bollywood celebs like Suniel Shetty and Tamannaah Bhatia playing important roles as well.::Bhadresh D Pandav

Aa Bb Kk is a Marathi feature film written by Aba Gaikwad and directed by Ramkumar Shedge and produced by Meehir Kulkarni, Film Is Based on social subject. A tragic tale of a girl Jani, who is branded as a curse by the society after her mother dies while giving birth. The film revolves around the hardships she and her brother Hari face in their day-to-day life.::Shrinivas G. Kulkarni

Jaani's mother passes away during her birth,while her father passes away during her seventh birthday so she is termed as a curse by the society.Her brother Hari leaves the village and starts living on the streets after the village's call her a curse his only motive is to educate Jani but he is worried how will he manage the expenses.Hari and Jani come across Aajya who has lost his wife and children and looks after Orphan's.They both start living with him but Hari feels that he should stand on his own feet and educate Jani and starts leaving in a crematorium.Hari struggles a lot and finally puts Jani to school.::alex.mjacko@gmail.com
